# Magical Academy (Building)
## Overview
**Magical Academy**

**Create** 121 Goods, 17 Influence, 110 Labor, 5 Magic (5,630 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Alchemy Lab (Room)|Alchemy Lab]], 2 [[Bath (Room)|Baths]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Bell Tower (Room)|Bell Tower]], 1 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 2 [[Classroom (Room)|Classrooms]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Greenhouse (Room)|Greenhouse]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Magical Repository (Room)|Magical Repository]], 1 [[Observation Dome (Room)|Observation Dome]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[Scriptorium (Room)|Scriptorium]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]]

An institution for training students in the magical arts.
